content: starting treble_crochet cluster round 8 ch1 *single_crochet in next chain 1 space ch6 single_crochet in next space ch3 sc5 in chain 4 space from prev round sc5 in next space ch3 repeat from * around slip_stitch to starting single_crochet round 9 *4 single_crochet in space 3 chain picot see pattern notes 4 single_crochet in same space 2 single_crochet in next space 3 chain picot 2 single_crochet in same space 2 double_crochet chain 1 special 2 treble_crochet cluster see notes chain 1 2 double_crochet 2sc in next space 3 chain picot 2 single_crochet in same space repeat from * slip_stitch to starting single_crochet fasten_off blocking some cupping in the center stitches is normal and can be blocked out pin flat to blocking board and spray with water or brush with a 50/50 mixture of glue and water if you want it to be slightly stiff and hold its shape better let dry completely 24+ hours unpin and display pattern by far field crafts 2024 do not reproduce
